dynamic_line.yes: Hello, Miss, What do you want from me?
dynamic_line.no: Hello, what do you want from me?

responses.text: How do you serve as a soldier for Gallia?

dynamic_line: It's pretty rough work, I can't speak about it much for security reasons, but I can tell you a bit. Imagine endless tedium interspersed with immediate threat from Imperial attack, that's what it's like being a soldier. The pay isn't very good, but you know you're fighting for your squad, hometown and country.

dynamic_line.yes: Hello, Miss, What do you want from me? I'm busy.
dynamic_line.no: Hello, what do you want from me? I'm busy.

responses.text: What are you currently doing as an officer?
Do you have a task for me?

dynamic_line: It's pretty busy serving as an officer in the Gallian military, especially during wartime. It's one thing to worry about one's own safety, it's another thing entirely to worry about all the men and women under your command!

description: A group of Imperial soldiers have begun scouting a local area, find them and kill them for us.

dialogue.describe: We need help in dispatching some Imperial troops that have encroached upon our sector.
dialogue.offer: In this sector of the Gallian front we've been rather stretched thin. Most of our available squads are either on the defense or probing the enemy's front lines. We need extra help dispatching a squad of Imperial troops that have set up within our sector. Would you be willing to help us?
dialogue.accepted: I look forward to seeing your results.
dialogue.rejected: With that rejection, Gallia grows a little bit weaker, bare that in mind.
dialogue.advice: Try to keep the imps at a distance, their armor is thicker than ours.
dialogue.success: Gallia thanks you for your service
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: Yet another encroachment of the Empire into our lands...
